title: Buckle your seatbelts
author: VD
content_html:
What with Turkey gearing up to invade northern Iraq and Pakistan putting its nominal democracy on hold, to say nothing of the increase in housing-related problems, it looks like things could get a bit bumpy around the world over the year leading up to the election.

I have no idea what this all means, I’m merely observing. Not feeling particularly communicative today, a little banged up from soccer last night.
